entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 16. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 2400 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
